CustomField.description: Icon corresponding to status of the Inspection.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE(Inspection_Health__c, "Not Started", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/Not_Started.png", "On Track", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/On_Track.png", "At risk", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/At_Risk.png", "Late", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/Late.png", "On Hold", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/On_Hold.png", "Completed", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/Completed.png", "Closed, not Completed", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/Closed_not_Completed.png", "/resource/ES_Status_logos/On_Track.png"), "status icon",25,25)
CustomField.label: Inspection Health
